website_summaries.verdict: While they're no bargain, the Bose SEI2 and SEI2i have an appealing, sweat-resistant design, are very comfortable to wear, and offer decent sound.
pros: The Bose SIE2 and SIE2i earphones fit securely and comfortably, are sweat-resistant, and their "open" design has its appeal
They also offer pleasantly full bass and include a Reebok "fitness" armband for wearing your portable music device
cons: The included armband won't house the iPhone 5 or new iPod Touch, they let in sound, and no carrying case is included

customer_reviews.title: NOT durable. Coating over wires peel away.
customer_reviews.text: Loved these headphones when I initially bought them. They were comfortable and had decent sound quality (for my needs anyway). However, a few months after I got them, the coating over the headphone wires started to peel away/disintegrate. They still work, but the quality/durability of these headphones is awful especially for the hefty price tag. I own $6 Panasonic headphones that have outlasted these. I definitely would not recommend these to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Shari DaCosta

customer_reviews.title: The volume/mic buttons will break quickly, but sound is good and phones otherwise stand up to sweat
customer_reviews.text: The inline mic/volume has broken on two units for me, and other seem to have the same problem. That said, the sound is still good and other than the "moving parts" they stand up to a lot of sweat. If they could remove the volume feature and lower the price, I would be a bigger fan. That said, they do work for the gym, but you have to use your device to change volume, which is a pain. I have been searching for workout headphones that stay in my ears, sound good, and do not fail due to sweat. These do well other than the volume adjustment, which should work longer. Overall, they are good but not for the price.
customer_reviews.author: E.R.

customer_reviews.title: Dispointing sport headphones
customer_reviews.text: One would think that anything carrying the Bose name would provide great sound...wrooong! What a let down these are. I am that guy who rather have lossless files than MP3s, the B&W than the run-of-the-mill brands one can find at best buy for instance...Not knocking those other brands or those who purchase them, but these headphone aren't worth the money. For half that price the OCX 685i will give you great sounds with good situational awareness while you get your workout on. I have returned those SIE2is the day after I have received them; What a disappointment; They look great though.
customer_reviews.author: Funky Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately, the headphones have stopped working. Ordering, ...
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, the headphones have stopped working. Ordering, shipping and receiving the headphones was ok. But they started shorting out by the volume control. The headphones have gotten light use. Used only about 2x a week for about 30 minutes. So about 9-10 months later they no longer work. Should have bought a new pair. My last new pair still work and I bought them 6 yrs ago.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron T. Broberg

customer_reviews.title: Great sports headphones
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a pair of sports headphones to wear while running or at the gym. I tried Bose MIE2i, but the mic / control module on the cord failed on two successive pairs due to exposure to sweat. Bose actually allowed me to get a warranty exchange on the second pair for these sport headphones which only cost me about $25. These have great audio quality and fit snugly but comfortably. After trying the other Bose models along with a few from other manufacturers, I have settled on these. They are the best sport headphones I have found.
customer_reviews.author: William Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, no noise-cancelling, "small" fit in my small ears just fine
customer_reviews.text: I feel so ridiculous for paying this much money for headphones BUT the quality is awesome, the sound is superb and they are cool-looking. I just have to be careful to put them out of sight when I'm in the office. The best feature is what it lacks -- no noise cancelling! That stuff gives me a huge headache after only 5 minutes, but now I can listen to music in the office or out on a run with no issues. Also, they stay in your ears (even my super small ones)! No more running with huge headphones on. :)
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: great headphones for a runner.
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a gift for a friend who enjoys running. They've been using them for a while now and tell me they really enjoy them, When i saw them last they still looked new and I'm told they sound great. I personally have a pair of bose in ear headphones too and can attest the the quality compared to the cheaper headphones. Also they come at a short length for when you attach your phone to your arm but they include an extension for regular use too.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these!!!
customer_reviews.text: If they had 0 stars I would've given that. I've had these for a year and a half. They are not sweat friendly as advertised. Just started running outside for the last few weeks in 70-80 degree weather, the inline mic buttons quit working and the line has static in it when I talk on the phone so that no one can even hear me. So, I called customer service and since it's out of the year warranty they would sell me another pair for $75 plus $10 for s&h. Case and point...$150 pair of headphones that aren't quality and do not last. I will not purchase Bose anything in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Chamb_J

customer_reviews.title: great for workout but Stay Hear ear tips it not as comfortable as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I used it on a daily basis and the sound is great but the Stay Hear ear tips is not as comfortable. I would have given it a 5 star but the ear tips disappointed me a bit. The medium is too big which causes a slight pain when using for a long time and the small tips is too small and the sound is being muddled by the surrounding music in the gym.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Robust headphones with great music quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item in October of 2013. I have had multiple years of great music and memories with this set of headphones. I originally paid $150 for these and still I feel like I got a good deal. The music quality is exceptional and customer service was always ready to deal with any issues I had. Today was the day that the left earphone decided to quit, now the hard part for me is whether I should purchase this same set or the new model. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: and really liked them all
customer_reviews.text: I've owned several pair of Bose headphones in this series, and really liked them all. Great balance of sound quality and being able to hear the outside world. I also like the Bose system for securing them in your ears, it's reliable and comfortable. I bought these for the water-resistance, and am disappointed that the headphone connecter comes straight out of the jack instead of being angled like other headphones in this series. The angled connector is easier to manage and more durable.
customer_reviews.author: Klopfenstein

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bose quality as expected!
customer_reviews.text: I used to take the regular Bos headphones to the gym, and just about anywhere. They got exposed to sweat, rain and got twisted up very easily. When I saw the new Sport headphones, I was intrigued. They are made for gym go-ers as well as for outdoor activities. I was thrilled and ordered my pair. I have them now and love them! Great Bose music quality with a volume switch and microphone that I don't have to worry about ruining at the gym. Plus they unravel easily after coming out of my gym bag. I highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: MidnightAria26

customer_reviews.title: Quality, sound, comfort and control of Apple devices!
customer_reviews.text: I recently discovered this type of Bose headphones after buying Earhoox, which I use with my iPhone EarPods. In the past I have had to use customized earphones to make sure the EarPods didn't slip out. I have enjoyed Bose QuietComfort Headphones when the weather is cooler than the high 90's-100's that are now common in Sacramento. When I saw these (which come with the same type of comfortable flexible silicone ear chosen material as Earhoox have, I was thrilled. Besides comfort, they also let me control my iPhone as well as the sound control on my iPad and computer.
customer_reviews.author: G. MCGOVERN

customer_reviews.title: For the Green fans
customer_reviews.text: (review by wife) the color may bother some, but i absolute love love the green & gray color scheme here. Great reliable product, as comfortable as can be for smaller ears but i still can't wear them for too long. Solid product, but just know the sound is not as great as over-the-ear headphones. appreciate the extension cord & arm band. Have yet to test if product is sweat-proof
customer_reviews.author: James Kim

customer_reviews.title: I love these earphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these earphones. I wanted to use them for a bit before I rated them. Sound quality is exceptional. They stay quite comfortably in my ears. The buttons work for starting music, pause, answering a call, and volume changes. I ended up buying a $5 case for these as the armband velcro that is supposed to hold the earphones when not in use is small and they tend to come off and I don't want to lose the earphones.
customer_reviews.author: Crazy AF Cop

customer_reviews.title: Okay sound
customer_reviews.text: I guess I did expect more since they are Bose. The sound wasn't at all as good or have as much clarity as I had hoped. The ear buds are awkward and you do have to get used to them and get past the "fitting" of them. They do stay in place for the most part. Comes with an armband sleeve to keep your ipod and ID and key in, which was nice. Not a bad product at all... just don't expect super Bose sound and you will be happy.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Gates

customer_reviews.title: Volume Control and Play/Pause Stopped Working after TWO Days!
customer_reviews.text: Just received the headphone on Friday and was very excited to try it. It was great! On tuesday, the volume control and Play/Pause stopped working on my iphone, ipod... Can't believe it For a pair of expensive earphone! Only worked for two days! Called the Bose customer service, and they will replace it for me but I will be paying the UPS return shipping fee of $7.50. I will keep updated.
customer_reviews.author: Peter

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality. Good for working out, personal monitors/live-stage setting, everyday use.
customer_reviews.text: I use these headphones primarily with the 'Mymix Audio' system at church. They work wonderfully with the personal monitor system and don't crackle or drop out sound like cheaper($50) headphones i have used in the past in stage settings. I also use them for everyday and working out. They stay in no matter the action and are comfortable for extended period of time. I gave it 4 stars because the cord is short even with the extender and the microphone is so unnecessary. (sometimes it gets bumped while i'm on stage and clicks). Otherwise FANTASTIC QUALITY. would recommend
customer_reviews.author: cbachellor

customer_reviews.title: Better than the non-sport variety...
customer_reviews.text: but still, here I am, 1 year and 1 month after putting these in use and the plastic molding around the plug has cracked. The plug is way over-engineered to begin with and it cracks? What's up with that? The only reason for going "it's ok" (3 stars) in my rating is the inline controls are much better made than the black&white Bose IE2i headphones. These controls still work after 1 year of good workouts.
customer_reviews.author: Steve S.

customer_reviews.title: Avg. headphones, terrible armband - not iPhone 5 compatible
customer_reviews.text: You will have to call Bose and pay and extra $10+ to get the armband made for the 5 - it's the same cheap material that keeps sliding down on your arm. It doesn't grip at all, they should've added neoprene like other armbands to make it grip better. I guess no one at Reebok or Bose runs. Like others have mentioned before on the sound quality, it sounds "tinny" and lacks little to no bass. The silicone ear pieces are nice and holds the buds in very well.
customer_reviews.author: RWM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the workout
customer_reviews.text: This is not one of those headphones that close you out from the outside world, they let you hear ambient sound meaning you can hear outside of the headphones but in a limited way. They are great for working out since it limits perspiration from getting into you ears. Controlling my music (pause, forward, reverse) is appreciated not to mention handling calls. I don't use the armband since it looks like more of a hassle then it is worth. Wish they had different colors rather than the green and orange however pretty happy with them. Overall this is the best workout headphones I've used.
customer_reviews.author: Knight565

customer_reviews.title: Thought it was ridiculous to spend this much on headphones.  I couldn't have been more wrong
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are beyond awesome. I am a log distance runner and run with these in half marathons all the time. They stay put and the sound quality is excellent! I love that I can also use them to talk on the phone as well. The only negative I have is the armband. I have small arms and am going to have to buy a new armband because the original one I have has stretched out and comes off easily now. I will however buy the same arm band as it is extremely comfortable and no chafing!
customer_reviews.author: Tybee

customer_reviews.title: These are for my wife, because I already have orange ones...
customer_reviews.text: You can't beat these headphones for the gym or any physical activity. I had a pair of the MIE2 headphones which I destroyed by sweating on them. Not too long after that Bose released these. They are comfortable and have great sound quality without completely sealing your ear off from the environment. Thus it's easy to carry on a conversation without removing them. Also, I have purchased many different earbud styled headphones over the years and these are by far the most comfortable as they don't put undue pressure on your tragus. You can wear these for a long period of time without any pain.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Carpenter

customer_reviews.title: OK quality for the price: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I paid 149$ for this product. These bose headphones were really comfortable and fit well. However, for the price I found the sound quality to be horrible. Apple's earpods are have much better sound quality than headphones even though they are only about 30$ (although they might not be as durable). I returned these headphones as soon as I tried them. I do not recommend buying this product. I think it is overpriced. If you want great sound quality and don't care about portability I would recommend buying the Audio Technica ATHM50.
customer_reviews.author: IA

customer_reviews.title: Cord Too Short
customer_reviews.text: Even though this version is made for the arm band, the cord is still too short. I know it's for jogging but most of the time we'll be using it for something else. It comes with an extension cord to make it longer but it's a little goofy and adds unnecessary weight to the cord. If you're walking and put your iPhone in your pocket, the earbuds will not reach your ears. I'm 5'9 - so not super tall. The sound is excellent just like the IE2i.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: One year old and the microphone doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: The headphones worked great (good sound, good bass), though they bothered my ears for the first couple months until I got used to them. Now they feel fine. I've only had them for a year and maybe used the microphone for 2-3 calls in that time, but the mic no longer works. I tried answering calls, using Siri on my iPhone, etc., and the mic didn't register any sound. Tested other earbuds with mics to ensure it wasn't an issue with the phone, but they all worked. I'm probably out of my warranty by now, but I can't recommend these after failing within a year. If you don't need the mic, buy the lower end headphones offered from Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Michael E Parsons

customer_reviews.title: ... bought these for my son and he is in love with them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son and he is in love with them. He let me try them and they are definitely the best quality headphones I have used. Also, I have small ears and the buds were very comfortable and stay put. They are not typical in the way the sit in your ear but once you get used to them, they are very good. Next pair will be for me.
customer_reviews.author: Chrissie Ha

customer_reviews.title: Was looking to replace my Beats earbuds..
customer_reviews.text: I run a lot and I wanted something the stayed on my ear. I have the Beats earbuds and I have had some issues with the in-line mic, so I have been looking around for a better quality and functional pair. This was not them. The sound was not as clear and it wouldn't stay on my ear like the beats did. Had to return. Still looking for a better pair.
customer_reviews.author: Allison Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Workout and want music? Buy these.
customer_reviews.text: Some of the best headphones I've owned. If you run/bike this is a must have. You can hear a lot out of them if you don't have it cranked up which is nice for riding or running with traffic. Quality is amazing and base is good despite them not having an air tight seal on your ear (intentional). Stop/skip works on Android but volume does not.
customer_reviews.author: that_guy

customer_reviews.title: Best headphone yet for running
customer_reviews.text: These are the best headphones that I have used for running. They don't hurt my ears and they don't fall out under any circumstances. The sound is great and the length of the cord is perfect for me without the included extra extension. I do not use the included arm band. I have not had any trouble with the mic or volume buttons. I have run outdoors with these for the last two months.
customer_reviews.author: Tlc01

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Headset
customer_reviews.text: These headsets are amazing. Great quality sound. You feel like you are taking your live concert running with you. The ear buds are so comfortable and really stay put. I run half marathons so ears but that stay without hurting is a big deal to me. I'm telling all my friends to buy one. And they are great for phone conversations too. So clear and you can control the volume, picking up a call, hanging up, put someone on hold all from the headset control buttons. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Damaris

customer_reviews.title: ORANGE
customer_reviews.text: love these. cycling and racquetball they just stay put and i like that they are NOT noise canceling which would be a problem on the road bike. the sound is wonderful, but i'm not picky like some. i just like to hear the rich tones and variations of my music. and unlike the apple ones that come with the iPhone, a quick three push of the button does skip back to the beginning of the song without fail. love the music controls!
customer_reviews.author: inlandempireca

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My wife was always complaining about never having ear buds when she needs them to run. Not only did I have to find her some ear buds, but they also had to look very different than the Apple-made ones the rest of us use. These would be hers and nobody would be allowed to touch them. After reading reviews ad nauseam, I chose these. And I wasn't disappointed. Neither was my wife. These are so light-weight, she can barely feel them when they're in, and the audio quality blows away the Apple ear buds that come with the devices. Maybe best of all, they actually fit human ears.
customer_reviews.author: Iophalanx

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but button is erratic
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great and they stay in my ears -- most importantly, when I'm lying down (so lame that Apple earbuds fall out if you lay down). But the middle button is erratic - hard to push once/twice/thrice to adjust track. As usual, no one has designed the perfect all around earbud - so I use these for hikes and Apple earbuds for laying down.
customer_reviews.author: P. Horne

customer_reviews.title: Only headbuds to ever stay in my ears!
customer_reviews.text: These are the first headbuds that stay in my ear when running! I have small ear cannels and normally shy away from headbuds, but needed a pair to train for my half-marathon. I've tried about 15 different styles of headbuds and not are as comfortable or fit as good as these. Love the sound quality- hear notes that I've never head when listening to music. The cord is a little short, but not that important to not give it a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Kori

customer_reviews.title: Do you want movie theater sound?
customer_reviews.text: I have very small ears and I run. This headphones are so anatomically well design that with my 5 year old ears!!! ( they are really tiny) I can run and they never fall. The sound is absolutely incredible and the color so cute. They have XL,L,M and S size so you can choose the best fit for your ears. The soft material never hurst my ears and believe me when I say that because I use them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Viviana

customer_reviews.title: love them so much... i bought another pair for a gift
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome.. I love wearing these while riding my bike... (probably shouldn't, but do!) talking on the phone through them is great... The person on the other end can not believe there isn't any wind noise. They really are the best and they are super comfortable to wear. I loved them so much, I bought another set for a gift. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: J. Cassidy

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: I used to have the ie2 headphones which I loved and these are a great successor. I love the new colors and I enjoy the microphone for phone calls which I didn't know how it would work. But the headphone phone volume is great and the microphone picks up my voice very well in a loud gym which is where I use it.
customer_reviews.author: Andre

customer_reviews.title: These are great sounding ear buds
customer_reviews.text: These are great sounding ear buds. Comfortable and stay in well. They are great for exercising and will stay in while jogging. The only thing I would improve is to make the cable replaceable all the way up the the ear bud. They are really good and you will like them.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Best sound ever however i have had 3 pair this ...
customer_reviews.text: Best sound ever however i have had 3 pair this last year and they have all broke. I dont use product in a manner that would cause premature failure. Volume/pause buttons stopped working in pairs 1&3. Pair 2 the plug stopped functioning in any player eg. Laptop, iphone, ipad or ipod. For cost they should last or warranty should cover at least a year.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Grabofsky

customer_reviews.title: Love These!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased the Beats Tour ear buds but after three weeks the volume control stopped working. I've always had a hard time finding a pair of ear buds that will stay in my ears and I've tried almost every kind. These Bose ear buds not only fit very comfortable and have yet to fall out, but the sound is simply amazing. I work out a lot and tend to perspire heavily I've heard that this is something to look out for as it would short the volume control as well, but that has yet to happen to me.
customer_reviews.author: Latoya Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Love Bose
customer_reviews.text: The headphones dont get in your way while you're working out,w hich I love. the cord is just the right length, and you can use the additional one they give you to make it longer if you want. The earphones fit great, they don't fall out. The sound is amazing, just like Bose products. Is awesome for working out
customer_reviews.author: Descena

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for running!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are the only headphones that have ever stayed in my ears while running! I have tried every other brand from a range of prices, including several of the YurBuds models. These fit perfectly and I have been using them for about a year now. Thank you for this quality product!
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for phone
customer_reviews.text: Although I do like these headphones, I find the earbuds a bit bulky compared to other models. When listening to music on my iPhone, I feel I want the music to be louder. The earbuds feel like the are not as close to my ear canal as other Bose earphones. However, they stay in my ear when running, and that is a big plus.
customer_reviews.author: John M. Tummon

customer_reviews.title: sound good but the wires are a little long
customer_reviews.text: sound good but the wires are a little long. It has an extension but its too short to carry the phone in your pocket and its too long while using it. I suppose its all relative to how tall/short you are.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: In poor shape, but desperate
customer_reviews.text: In poor shape, but desperate, so could not return upon receipt. yellowed earpiece, very short in length, kinking in the end of the earphone jack, appears ready to split.
customer_reviews.author: Schnoor5

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, a bit fragile.
customer_reviews.text: Sound great, they don't fall out of your ears. They are a bit fragile. I have owned two pairs of these, where wire enters ear piece has broken on the previous pair. Supposedly Bose has improved the strength of this weak point.
customer_reviews.author: TNT Pro

customer_reviews.title: Volume Control Failed
customer_reviews.text: I used these for running about 20 times, hooked up to an iPod mini. I thought they were great, when they were working. Toward the end of my runs, the volume would increase to the maximum, without touching the volume controls. After a couple of times, the volume controls then stopped working entirely. Bose is replacing them, but is charging me a fee to ship back their defective headphones. They also won't ship the new headphones until I ship them the defective headphones. Bose also says that it will take 7-10 business days for me to receive the new headphones. Really??
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rautmann

customer_reviews.title: Not sure about the ear buds
customer_reviews.text: I had Sennheiser head phones but the ear piece started to break and wouldnt stay in. Bought these thinking the would have better sound. The sound is pretty good but not so much noise cancellation, it doesnt say that they are but i thought they might. I do hear a lot of background noise while they are in. But the ear buds are one piece silicon type material so i think they would last a long time. The mic works for non-iphones too.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee Kondo

customer_reviews.title: they are good headphones!
customer_reviews.text: i enjoy wearing these and they stay in your ears relatively well. i would say that their are other brands that stay better. i have a small ear cannel and they whole twisting thing does not work well for me. i prefer the jaybird wireless and the beats by dre ones. they stay in better and work for small ears.
customer_reviews.author: Foodie

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones. I have never been an in-ear headphone ...
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. I have never been an in-ear headphone user but this product delivers great sound without being uncomfortable. The only issue is the standard chord is a bit too short. The extension provided is great at solving this problem, but the extension makes the chord a bit awkward and cumbersome due to the connection port in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Henry Engelstein

customer_reviews.title: Noise bleeds through like loud mini speakers!!!
customer_reviews.text: First off I was really looking forward to these after hearing countless people telling me how good they are. Granted the sound quality is amazing. Thats only becuase they basicaly act like the worls smallest speakers. The noise bleed is awful I had to turn the voume all the way down to the last two notches for no one to hear the sound. It is very dissapointing that I can get wo called lower quality headphones for $40 and turn them up all the way and not have nearly as much noise as these bleed through. I dont think they are worth anyones money. Highly dissapointing.
customer_reviews.author: No

customer_reviews.title: Good sound but
customer_reviews.text: Well they are Bose, you can only expect good sound and good fit. I was expecting also that the controls would last a bit longer.. They died 3months after purchase. I use them a lot for long bike rides and runs. Now I keep using them due the sound quality but that's about it.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Stohr

customer_reviews.title: So cool!
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are the best by far. The shortened length is perfect for running and the earpieces fit comfortable without coming loose. The sound quality of Bose is awesome. They also provide an extension if you prefer a longer cord. You won't regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Like Them
customer_reviews.text: Con: wished it blocked out sound a little more Pro: Sounds really nice, fit nicely, and are comfortable to wear for extended amounts of time. They seem like they would fall out easily, but if you put the right size on it, they stay on even with lots of activity.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetestjoy

customer_reviews.title: Best ear buds around
customer_reviews.text: Best ear buds around. I already had a pair and I ordered these for my son. They do not fall out while running and the sound quality is fabulous. Love the extension that comes with the wire so you can chose the length. The controls on the headset are great as well - very helpful when exercising or outside when you can't see the display on your phone or mp3 player. Durable as well. Great find and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen T. Ray

customer_reviews.title: Greatness in a Box
customer_reviews.text: As many other reviews point out, these are not noise-cancelling headphones, but that's not what I was looking for. I was looking for something to use when I workout. I wanted great sound, comfortable-non slip ear phones, and a cord that doesn't get in the way. Bose delivers on all accounts!
customer_reviews.author: ntthone

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable Headphones That Sound Great!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using my pair for about a year now and I absolutely love these headphones! I run almost daily with them and they sound great while never falling out! I run in Wisconsin so these have been exposed to a wide range of weather, and everything still works perfectly! I would definitely recommend these durable headphones for anyone who wants great sound quality and headphones that will actually stay in your ears!
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love!
customer_reviews.text: I have the Bose noise canceling headphones for traveling and decided to give these a whirl for working out (several other headphones have shorted out) and absolutely love them. The sound is phenomenal. I was looking for something to prevent me from hearing myself breathe and from the hearing the person next to me running/pounding the pavement and these deliver!
customer_reviews.author: DKing

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, but not cat-proof
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, works with phones, and comes with soft adapters for multiple sizes of ears. While skinny and trendy, these are not cat proof - and if you have a cat, be prepared to buy two or three - dang expensive cat toys.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Good design
customer_reviews.text: Great in-ear design, fits securely even during most vigorous of activities. Poor sound quality during phone conversations. Call conversations barely audible. Music output is excellent, but the microphone not so much. Easy decision to return products immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Ravi Venkatarama

customer_reviews.title: Perfect accessory
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect with my iPhone so that I can listen to music while I walk and still know if I receive a text or call. Easy to control the phone (forward songs, answer call, change volume) and the built in microphone means I can talk on the phone without removing it from pocket. Great sound quality one would expect from Bose.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: the sound is excelent but the quality of the cover wire is awful
customer_reviews.text: the sound is excelent but the quality of the cover wire is awful , it broke in less than to years. Im sorry because the soud is very nice.. I hope Bose can improve the materials
customer_reviews.author: Omar Porciuncula

customer_reviews.title: Volume control issues
customer_reviews.text: After several months of use (with little abuse) the volume on my iphone goes up and down when these are pugged in. Sometimes dramatically, where I have to pull the ear buds off quickly. Also the volume control on the ear buds stopped working (I think that is part of the problem). They worked great for a while and the sound quality is great but not a big fan of getting blown away all of a sudden when I am running.
customer_reviews.author: Erika S Hays

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Bought a pair for myself and loved them. Bought a pair for my sister with this purple. She loves them. Have several bose products at home and you just can't go wrong with the bose. Check out the bose solo it's awesome
customer_reviews.author: Chris Jones

customer_reviews.title: Bose sports headphones
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones. The only issue was I tried registering them with Bose and the serial number isn't supported for some odd reason. Makes me wonder if they are authentic. I don't doubt they are I just wish I could register them and get warranty on them.
customer_reviews.author: Saul G. Orozco

customer_reviews.title: Microphone stopped working after about 8 months, so they're ...
customer_reviews.text: Microphone stopped working after about 8 months, so they're only earbuds now - no talking on the cellphone with them :-(.
customer_reviews.author: Woman in Utah

customer_reviews.title: I love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: I love these headphones. They fit!!! They don't fall out of my ears, EVER. Great design. Sound in not for an extreme audiofile but if you need earbuds, get these
customer_reviews.author: Ron Likes Toys

customer_reviews.title: Bose sport headphones
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Bose sound. The assortment of earpieces fit with no problem and the additional stabilizers don't allow the earbuds to fall out! even when on the elliptical trainer. A great deal. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: Really Good but not Great
customer_reviews.text: Best I've owned so far but toes were cheap compared to Bose. I was a tad diff appointed in the base quality, but they do sound pretty dang good. Package deal is great to work out with.
customer_reviews.author: Chase Dub

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: I have owned Bose earbuds for years and always wished they were sport earbuds. Finally I got my wish and Bose came through. These are great. Perfect sound quality, comfortable, sweat proff and you can still hear what is going on around you.
customer_reviews.author: CStewart

customer_reviews.title: These are amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have never had a pair of headphones not fall out when I work out especially when I run...These have never fallen out once and have owned for over a year now. They do not short out with water and the sound quality is still great.
customer_reviews.author: sulzerjp

customer_reviews.title: Extremely Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love these. They worked so well for....one month. The problem is they are advertised as heavy duty, but they are not. The first pair I bought shorted out after running with them for a month. I would clean them as directed after each run but they still died. Bought a second pair - same exact issue. My first major disappointment with a Bose product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally a pair of headphones I can run with!
customer_reviews.text: I barely ever right review, but I had to in this case. I have been searching for years for a pair of headphones I can run with and can hold my iphone while I run. These fit the bill and are totally worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: D-Rod

customer_reviews.title: good ear buds
customer_reviews.text: great earbuds, but the " gold medal " earbuds by skull candy are the best for the money unless you go really high end, they beat bose and beets by dre. Someone tell me, why don't they sell replacement rubber tips. The aftermarket ones are junk.
customer_reviews.author: James Carlson

customer_reviews.title: Good quality Bose sound
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a present for my wife and she loves them. They stay in her ear well and produce very nice Bose quality sound. Bought them in purple for her. She wears them while exercising at the club.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B.

customer_reviews.title: not rugged enough to be called 'sport'
customer_reviews.text: Great sound from these, but I'd expect a "sport" model headphone to be more durable. They didn't last a year of normal active use before developing a short.
customer_reviews.author: GG

customer_reviews.title: Great Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones, they fit very well in the ear and stay put during a run. Quality sound as expected from Bose. I also like the extention you can add if you need a longer cord. Nice quality from Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Scales

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE earphones. They are the best I have ever had. They never fall out when you're exercising and the sound is amazing. Mine came with the extension and an armband as well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fox

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: I had the IE2i and used them for the gym but the water started messing with them. These earphones provide the same incredible sound quality + waterproof so sweat won't ruin them. The microphone works for calls for the Nokia Lumia 920 btw, but cannot control the music controls.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Would probably buy again!
customer_reviews.text: Super comfortable, versatile headphones! Only three things could make these better in my mind. I wish the buttons were a little bigger. I wish these came in black like the MIE2Is. Finally, I wish I could stop getting these stolen. On my third pair now.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Whitesell

customer_reviews.title: They do not fall out of his hears and are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my husband and he absolutely loves them. They do not fall out of his hears and are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Kim T

customer_reviews.title: very nice
customer_reviews.text: It's Bose, how can you go wrong. If you are willing to spend the money these are great headphones. Comfortable and sound is as expected from Bose. I use them every day and like them very much. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jim desantis

customer_reviews.title: Great in ear head phones.
customer_reviews.text: Use almost daily with iPhone. Good sound, good quality very water resistant. The extension cable is a nice touch. You won't be disappointed. NO heavy Bass, just crystal clear music.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sova

customer_reviews.title: Bose never lets you down
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered the Monster Isport headphones and was so dissatisfied that I returned them and opt to purchase the Bose Sport. Well let me tell you if you love bass like I do these are for you. They are little more expensive but you get what you pay for. You also get an Arm band which fits the iphone or Itouch which is a nice little item included. All in all I can't wait to start running with them and hopefully use them for years.
customer_reviews.author: Neal P. Lauro

customer_reviews.title: excellent headphones
customer_reviews.text: these headphones are perfect. they dont fall out when i run and the sound quality is fantastic. the volume buttons are also convienently located. all in all you cant go wrong wiht these and the old saying you get what you pay for goes...pricey!
customer_reviews.author: Timothy E. Principe

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the best running earphones I've used
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best running earphones I've used. I run about 30 miles a week and have been running for 20 years, so I have much experience on this topic. I only deducted one star because the microphone died after 6 months and I had to replace. I loved these so much that I replaced them again after my cat ate a pair.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, not cheap
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and great sound, a notch below the high end earphones. The way the wire is made, it tends not to tangle like the cheaper stuff. Pricey but like all Bose, you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Big Listener

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Headphones
customer_reviews.text: These are without a doubt the best earbud headphones I've ever had the pleasure of wearing. I wanted a set that I could use both casually and while exercising and tried many different types. These were the only ones that gave exceptional sound quality, good control, and a great fit. And, they never fall out when I run. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Mucchetti

customer_reviews.title: In love!
customer_reviews.text: My best friend bought me these and I immediately fell in love! I've had them for a year now and they still work and sound as amazing as the first day I got them.
customer_reviews.author: Mitchell Rogers

customer_reviews.title: definitely a recommend
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my second pair of these. Lost the first one due to my own clumsiness. They sound great, they stick to your ear even when mountain biking, skiing or snowboard and they have remote buttons on the cable. Mine came with a nice carrying pouch and several different ear inserts. Have been using for over two years.
customer_reviews.author: pale

customer_reviews.title: They sound great but the buttons break
customer_reviews.text: They sound great but the buttons break. I have owned 6 pairs of these Bose headphones. They work for a few months and then the buttons and mic stop working.
customer_reviews.author: David Grey

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line
customer_reviews.text: There are 3 things I love about the Bose headphones: 1) The sound quality is incomparable to any other in-ear headphones I have ever had the chance to experiment with 2) Even when you are playing audio in a high volume, you can still hear the surroundings, and I think that is a good thing in sports headphones 3) These are the first headphones that I have had that have never fallen from my ears - no matter which bumps I hit with my bike or how strong the wind Caution: Don't try them if you cannot afford them. Because once you have tried them, you will not be able to go back
customer_reviews.author: Ido Weinberg

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't star perfect inside my ears while running
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't star perfect inside my ears while running, but sound quality is superb and I use it for my day-to-day, at home or walking in the streets.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: LOVE LOVE LOVE
customer_reviews.text: These headphones are the best ever. Three different sizes so you get a great fit. Don't love the phone case but it was not why I bought the headphones.
customer_reviews.author: stshadrick

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Solid fit. i can run or lift without them falling out of my ears. Good bose sound. Mic gives a clear sound to whoever you are talking to.
customer_reviews.author: Dave

customer_reviews.title: I must be going Deaf
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality was "meh". Seriously, I'd like to think I have an average ear, and the small was too small and the large was too large, and so the medium was the lesser of the 3 crappy fits. I understand that runners need to be aware of their surroundings, but the volume and bass was just not good enough for over $100. On a good note, the headphones stayed in my ear pretty well. I had to return these and got some Bluetooth LG 730's for half the price.
customer_reviews.author: Raihan M. Ali

customer_reviews.title: They stay in your ears!
customer_reviews.text: I love bose products. The sound quality is unparalleled and is totally worth the money. As a runner, I was sad that my original in ear headphones by bose wouldn't stay in my ears while I was running. I'm so happy that bose decided to make a sport version because they are just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria B.

customer_reviews.title: like an concert
customer_reviews.text: very good headset sound great good for gym or going out for a walk and to realax and its good because it won't fall off your ear with small hole like me lol
customer_reviews.author: mandy

customer_reviews.title: Okay for working out
customer_reviews.text: Microphone on this headset does not work very well however sound quality is great. Husband loves the colour. Great for working out
customer_reviews.author: Charley MacLeod

product_meta.title: Bose SIE2i Sport Headphones - Green
product_meta.description:
Push your workout to the limit with headphones that are up to the task. Bose SIE2i sport headphones, customized for select Apple devices, are specifically engineered for exercise. They're sweat- and weather-resistant, stay comfortably yet securely in place and deliver robust Bose sound to keep you energized - a combination of benefits conventional sport ear buds can't match. Plus, the inline remote and microphone let you control music on your iPhone or iPod and take calls with one-touch ease.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


BOSE® SIE2I SPORT HEADPHONES
 * Tonally balanced audio with crisp highs and deep lows
 * StayHear ear tips remain in place even during strenuous workouts
 * Sweat- and weather-resistance, using hydrophobic acoustic cloth
 * Inline remote/mic controls music and takes calls with the press of a button
 * Reebok fitness armband holds your audio device during exercise

ENGINEERED FOR EXERCISE™
Push your workout to the limit with headphones that are up to the task. Bose SIE2i sport headphones, customized for select Apple devices, are specifically engineered for exercise. They're sweat- and weather-resistant, stay comfortably yet securely in place and deliver robust Bose sound to keep you energized—a combination of benefits conventional sport earbuds can't match. Plus, the inline remote and microphone let you control music on your iPhone or iPod and take calls with one-touch ease.

Water-resistant cloth keeps rain and sweat away from the headphones' speakers 
ENERGIZING SOUND. BOLD STYLE.
Exclusive TriPort headphone technology delivers wide-range sound, including the deep, convincing lows that give your music—and your workout—its pulse. And because it comes from an in-ear headphone, you'll feel driven without feeling closed off from your environment—a must when you're running outdoors. These headphones can add extra punch to your exercise routine.


STABILITY AND DURABILITY
Our StayHear tips conform securely and comfortably to your ears' shape, even during vigorous workouts. The speaker elements are covered with hydrophobic cloth that keeps moisture out but lets sound pass through. Cables and connections are made extra sturdy. SIE2i sport headphones are made for motion. Even their bold colors (Green, Orange, Blue, Purple) have an energy all their own.


ONE-TOUCH EASE FOR MUSIC AND CALLS
SIE2i sport headphones have an inline remote that offers convenient control over the music on your iPod or iPhone. Skip a tune with the press of a button. No need to touch your device—a great feature for running. There's also an inline microphone for taking calls and switching seamlessly between calls and music.

StayHear tips come in 3 sizes (S, M, L) 
REEBOK FITNESS ARMBAND
There's another great workout feature—the exclusive Reebok armband. It holds your music device in place when you're exercising, and stores the headphones when you're not. It even has a separate pocket for your keys. It's made of stretchy, breathable fabric that adjusts to fit most smartphones and MP3 players, and has a touch-sensitive window for easy usability. Available in colors to match your SIE2i sport headphones.


WHAT'S IN THE BOX
 * SIE2i sport headphones
 * 3 pairs StayHear tips (S, M, L)
 * Exclusive Reebok fitness armband
 * Clothing clip
 * Extension cable

Reebok armband holds your music device in place while working out, and comes in colors to match your SIE2i sport headphones
feature_bullets: Tonally balanced audio with crisp highs and deep lows
Stay Hear ear tips remain in place even during strenuous workouts
Sweat- and weather-resistance, using hydrophobic acoustic cloth
Inline remote/mic controls music and takes calls with the press of a button
Reebok fitness armband holds your audio device during exercise

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars635 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
